title: Schema for a 360Giving Data Grant Package

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the 360Giving schema used in this package, expressed as major.minor For example: 1.1

extensions.title: Extensions
extensions.description: An array of strings which refer to 360Giving Extensions in use by this data file. See the [360Giving Extensions guidance](https://standard.threesixtygiving.org/en/latest/technical/metadata/#field-guidance) for details.

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the 360Giving data package. Should be a human readable version of information contained in the filename of the data and should be unique

description.title: Description
description.description: Full description of the information contained in the 360Giving data package.

issued.title: Issued
issued.description: The date that this data package was issued. The date must be written as YYYY-MM-DD, or in full date-time format

modified.title: Modified
modified.description: The date that this data package was last modified. A full date-time format must be used.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: A unique identifier for this data package. This should be unique for a particular publisher.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Information to uniquely identify the publisher of this package.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The organisation identifier as described by [Organisation Identifier Standard](https://standard.threesixtygiving.org/en/latest/technical/identifiers/#organisation-identifier)

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the entity responsible for publishing this data.

website.title: Website
website.description: URL of the website of the publishing entity.

logo.title: Logo
logo.description: URL of the logo of the publishing entity.

downloadURL.title: Download URL
downloadURL.description: URL of where this data package can be downloaded.

accessURL.title: Access URL
accessURL.description: URL of the website where this data package can be found.

license.title: License
license.description: A link to the license that applies to the data in this package. A Public Domain Dedication or [Open Definition Conformant](http://opendefinition.org/licenses/) license is strongly recommended. The canonical URI of the license should be used. Documents linked from this file may be under other license conditions.
